experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.subtitle: XYZ Ltd
workDescription: As a full-stack developer, I have good experience of building ecommerce websites with WordPress. I gained extensive experience with HTML/CSS/JavaScript/Vue skills.
I had done a lot of works such as integrating APIs, creating plugins and customizing themes using WordPress, PHP.

experiences.title: Front-End Developer
experiences.subtitle: XYZ Ltd
workDescription: I participated in a project under development and made revisions to several pages using WordPress Plugin, WordPress Theme and WordPress Websites. During this process I gained extensive experience with Html, CSS, Javascript and SimpleCSS plugin.

In find-doctor page, I used React to design the entire page, build the page, and combine it with the original project using plugins. During this process, I gained extensive experience with Html, CSS, Javascript, Typescript and React.

experiences.title: Frontend Developer
experiences.subtitle: ABC Pvt Ltd
workDescription: To address performance issues, I implemented various techniques such as lazy loading, code minification, and caching mechanisms. During this process I gained extensive experience with Javascript, Typescript, Angular and Node.JS.

Creating a responsive design that adapts seamlessly to different screen sizes and devices was another challenge. During this process I gained extensive experience with Html, CSS, Javascript, Bootstrap, Typescript and Angular.
